channel.title: A small little question?
channel.description:
Is there any possibility to make a code that if you use an item (such as a key) on another item (such as a chest) an npc appears? I know how to use item on object but not how to spawn the npc when you use it :o
Always, Tez.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2007, 06:33:59 PM[/size][hr]Help? :o
Double ;/[br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2007, 07:13:18 PM[/size][hr]Around 6 hours and no answer? :eek:
Tripple :/ [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] We don't bump topics, or double post. Especially with stupid messages.[/center]

item.title: A small little question?
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Patience is what we need here.Some newbies start to get the forum’s reputation now.

Nobody is going to help you at this rate.

Read full topic
